description: Uva Province - Appointing Hon. Shasheendra Kumara Rajapakshe, Chief Minister as the Minister of Finance and Planning etc; Hon Anura Ravindra Vidanagamage as the Minister of Agriculture etc.; Hon Rathnayake Mudiyanselage Kumarasiri Rathnayake as the Minister of Health etc.; Hon Akalan Senthil Thondaman Muththuvinayagam as the Minister of Road Development.; and Hon. Arthur Chamara Sampath Dasanayake Don as the Minister of Sports and Youth Affairs etc., to the 06th Provincial Council of Uva Province
